item.title: Volunteer
item.description: Become a volunteer at DSSG now Whether you’re a data wizzard or a great organizer who abhors numbers, your contribution makes a difference. Here is how. Join our events as a data scientist Only have an evening or a weekend to spare? Help nonprofits by joining one of our events! Lorem. Work with non-profits as a data ambassador (require DS knowledge) The next step in volunteering is helping us to consult npos in office hours, scope projects in data impact mapping workshops and prepare projects for datathons.
